CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Plant__r.Products_Availability__c, "AGO B7"), "AGO B7;","") & IF( INCLUDES(Plant__r.Products_Availability__c , "IGO 50ppm"), "IGO 50ppm;","") & IF( INCLUDES(Plant__r.Products_Availability__c, "ULG95 E5"), "ULG95 E5;","")
CustomField.label: Product Sub Group Availability
